labelRegister: Sign up for your OMG Forever account to access social games, communities, and profiles.
labelHighQualityDescription: Disable this setting if you're having low framerates.
labelHighResolutionWallpapersDescription:
Use awesome 4K wallpapers instead of 1080p.
These might make the platform run a little slower on some machines.
labelConfirmPasswordError: Password fields must be the same.
labelVerifyEmailBody: For verification purposes, a code has been sent to %EMAIL% and should arrive in your email inbox momentarily. Please check your email and, once received, enter the code below.
labelChooseNameBody: Enter a name you want people to know you by.
